^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ComponentsProtected.description: An array of links to resources that this component provides integrity protection.
ComponentsProtected.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources that this component provides integrity protection.

HardwareWriteProtected.description: An indication whether the hardware write protection is enabled.
HardwareWriteProtected.longDescription: This property shall indicate the hardware write protection status, where a value `true` shall indicate that the hardware write protection is enabled, and all requests for software write protection will be ignored.

PCIeReferenceClockCount.description: The number of PCIe reference clock and reset pairs on this baseboard.
PCIeReferenceClockCount.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of PCIe reference clock and reset pairs on this baseboard.

PartNumber.longDescription: This property shall contain the chassis part number that allows partners to populate.

SerialNumber.longDescription: This property shall contain the chassis serial number that allows partners to populate.

title: #NvidiaChassis.v1_0_0
